location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国北京市中南海
location.en: Zhongnanhai, Beijing, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 1976年10月6日在中华人民共和国首都北京发生的一场政治事件。时任中共中央第一副主席、国务院总理华国锋联合中共中央副主席叶剑英、中共中央办公厅主任汪东兴等人，将时任中共中央副主席王洪文、中央政治局常委张春桥、中央政治局委员江青、姚文元（“四人帮”）及其支持者隔离抓捕的事件。
description.en: A bloodless coup d'état in Beijing on October 6, 1976, in which Hua Guofeng, Ye Jianying, and Wang Dongxing arrested the Gang of Four, effectively ending the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国共产党中央委员会主席、中华人民共和国国务院总理。粉碎“四人帮”事件的主要决策者之一。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Chairman of the Chinese Communist Party and Premier of the People's Republic of China. He was a key leader in the plot to arrest the Gang of Four.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军元帅，曾任中共中央副主席、中央军委副主席。粉碎“四人帮”事件的主要决策者之一。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Liberation Army, who served as Vice Chairman of the CCP Central Committee and Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission. He was a key leader in the plot to arrest the Gang of Four.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央办公厅主任、中共中央副主席。粉碎“四人帮”事件的主要策划和执行者之一。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Director of the General Office of the CCP and Vice Chairman of the CCP. He was a key planner and executor of the arrest of the Gang of Four.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国主席。粉碎“四人帮”事件的支持者和参与者。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as President of the People's Republic of China. He was a supporter and participant in the plot to arrest the Gang of Four.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命后期由江青、张春桥、姚文元、王洪文组成的中共党内政治集团。他们在1976年10月6日被隔离审查。
description.en: A political faction within the CCP composed of Jiang Qing, Zhang Chunqiao, Yao Wenyuan, and Wang Hongwen, who rose to prominence during the Cultural Revolution. They were arrested on October 6, 1976.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，“四人帮”成员之一，曾任中共中央副主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, a member of the Gang of Four who served as Vice Chairman of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，“四人帮”成员之一，曾任中共中央政治局常委、国务院副总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, a member of the Gang of Four who served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee and Vice Premier.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，毛泽东的第四任妻子，“四人帮”核心成员。
description.en: Chinese politician and the fourth wife of Mao Zedong, she was a core member of the Gang of Four.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，“四人帮”成员之一，主要负责宣传工作。
description.en: Chinese politician, a member of the Gang of Four who was primarily responsible for propaganda.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，毛泽东的侄子，在毛泽东晚年担任其与中共中央政治局之间的联络员。
description.en: Chinese politician, nephew of Mao Zedong, who served as Mao's liaison to the Politburo in his later years.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东发起和领导的在中国发生的政治运动。粉碎“四人帮”标志着该运动的结束。
description.en: A political movement in China initiated and led by Mao Zedong. The smashing of the Gang of Four marked its end.

nodes.id: Death and state funeral of Mao Zedong

en: Death and state funeral of Mao Zedong

description.zh-cn: 中共中央主席毛泽东于1976年9月9日逝世。他的去世在中国共产党内部造成了权力真空，是粉碎“四人帮”事件的直接导火索之一。
description.en: CCP Chairman Mao Zedong died on September 9, 1976. His death created a power vacuum within the CCP and was a direct short-term cause of the smashing of the Gang of Four.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，粉碎“四人帮”后成为中华人民共和国的实际最高领导人，开启了改革开放。
description.en: Chinese politician who became the paramount leader of the People's Republic of China after the Gang of Four was smashed, initiating the era of Reform and Opening-up.

description.zh-cn: 一个在粉碎“四人帮”后由邓小平主导的，旨在纠正文化大革命错误的政治运动。
description.en: A political movement led by Deng Xiaoping after the smashing of the Gang of Four, aimed at correcting the mistakes of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 1978年12月中共十一届三中全会后，中国开始实行的一系列以经济改革为主的政策。粉碎“四人帮”为此铺平了道路。
description.en: A series of economic reforms initiated in China after the Third Plenary Session of the 11th Central Committee of the CCP in December 1978. The smashing of the Gang of Four paved the way for this.

nodes.id: Case of the Lin Biao and Jiang Qing counter-revolutionary group

zh-cn: 林彪、江青反革命集团案
en: Case of the Lin Biao and Jiang Qing counter-revolutionary group

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高人民法院特别法庭对林彪、江青两个反革命集团主犯的审判。
description.en: The trial of the principal culprits of the Lin Biao and Jiang Qing counter-revolutionary cliques by the Special Tribunal of the Supreme People's Court of the PRC.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高审判机关。
description.en: The highest court in the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: Chairman of the Chinese Communist Party

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会主席
en: Chairman of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1945年至1982年间的最高领导人职务。
description.en: The title of the leader of the Chinese Communist Party from 1945 to 1982.

nodes.id: Chairman of the Central Military Commission (China)

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央军事委员会主席
en: Chairman of the Central Military Commission (China)

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央军事委员会的最高领导人职务。
description.en: The title of the leader of the Central Military Commission of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家、政治家、理论家，中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和第一代最高领导人。他的逝世引发了导致粉碎“四人帮”的权力斗争。
description.en: Chinese communist revolutionary who was the founder of the People's Republic of China. His death precipitated the power struggle that led to the smashing of the Gang of Four.

description.zh-cn: 作为主要领导人之一，联合叶剑英、汪东兴等人策划并执行了抓捕“四人帮”的行动。
description.en: As one of the main leaders, he joined forces with Ye Jianying, Wang Dongxing and others to plan and execute the arrest of the Gang of Four.

description.zh-cn: 作为主要领导人之一，与华国锋、汪东兴等人策划并执行了抓捕“四人帮”的行动。
description.en: As one of the main leaders, he joined forces with Hua Guofeng, Wang Dongxing and others to plan and execute the arrest of the Gang of Four.

description.zh-cn: 作为主要领导人之一，负责具体执行抓捕“四人帮”的行动。
description.en: As one of the main leaders, he was responsible for the specific execution of the arrest of the Gang of Four.

description.zh-cn: 参与了抓捕“四人帮”的密谋，并作为华国锋和叶剑英之间的联络人。
description.en: Participated in the secret planning to arrest the Gang of Four, acting as a liaison between Hua Guofeng and Ye Jianying.

description.zh-cn: “四人帮”全体成员在此事件中被逮捕。
description.en: All members of the Gang of Four were arrested during this event.

description.zh-cn: 在怀仁堂被逮捕。
description.en: Was arrested at Huairen Hall.

description.zh-cn: 在怀仁堂被逮捕。
description.en: Was arrested at Huairen Hall.

description.zh-cn: 在其住所被逮捕。
description.en: Was arrested at her residence.

description.zh-cn: 在怀仁堂被逮捕。
description.en: Was arrested at Huairen Hall.

description.zh-cn: 作为“四人帮”的支持者，在满洲被逮捕。
description.en: As a supporter of the Gang of Four, was arrested in Manchuria.

description.zh-cn: 该事件的胜利标志着持续十年的“文化大革命”的结束。
description.en: The victory of this event marked the end of the ten-year-long Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 事件发生后，华国锋被推举为中共中央主席和中央军委主席，成为最高领导人。
description.en: After the event, Hua Guofeng was appointed Chairman of the CCP Central Committee and Chairman of the Central Military Commission, becoming the paramount leader.

description.zh-cn: 该事件为邓小平的复出并最终成为最高领导人铺平了道路。
description.en: The event paved the way for Deng Xiaoping's return to power and eventual rise to paramount leader.

description.zh-cn: 该事件的发生开启了“拨乱反正”时期。
description.en: This event marked the beginning of the 'Boluan Fanzheng' period.

description.zh-cn: 该事件为之后的“改革开放”创造了政治条件。
description.en: This event created the political conditions for the subsequent 'Reform and opening up'.

relationships.source: Death and state funeral of Mao Zedong

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东的逝世造成了权力真空，是导致粉碎“四人帮”的短期原因之一。
description.en: The death of Mao Zedong created a power vacuum, which was one of the short-term causes leading to the smashing of the Gang of Four.

description.zh-cn: 对“文化大革命”的普遍不满是粉碎“四人帮”的长期原因。
description.en: Widespread dissatisfaction with the Cultural Revolution was a long-term cause for the smashing of the Gang of Four.

relationships.target: Chairman of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 在粉碎“四人帮”后的政治局会议上被一致通过，担任中共中央委员会主席。
description.en: Was unanimously approved to serve as Chairman of the CCP Central Committee at the Politburo meeting after the smashing of the Gang of Four.

relationships.target: Chairman of the Central Military Commission (China)

description.zh-cn: 在粉碎“四人帮”后的政治局会议上被一致通过，担任中共中央军委主席。
description.en: Was unanimously approved to serve as Chairman of the CCP Central Military Commission at the Politburo meeting after the smashing of the Gang of Four.

relationships.target: Case of the Lin Biao and Jiang Qing counter-revolutionary group

description.zh-cn: 粉碎“四人帮”事件直接导致了对林彪、江青反革命集团的公开审判。
description.en: The smashing of the Gang of Four directly led to the public trial of the Lin Biao and Jiang Qing counter-revolutionary groups.

relationships.target: Case of the Lin Biao and Jiang Qing counter-revolutionary group

description.zh-cn: 最高人民法院的特别法庭公开审理了林彪、江青反革命集团案。
description.en: The Special Tribunal of the Supreme People's Court publicly tried the case of the Lin Biao and Jiang Qing counter-revolutionary groups.

description.zh-cn: 在毛泽东晚年，毛远新担任他与中共中央之间的联络员。
description.en: In Mao Zedong's later years, Mao Yuanxin acted as his liaison to the CCP Central Committee.
